title: Calendar for Oct. 13, 2015
text: Calendar for Oct. 13, 2015 Calendar for Oct. 13, 2015 By Union Democrat staff October 13, 2015 01:00 am TUOLUMNE COUNTY TODAY ATCAA Food Bank distribution, 10 a.m. to 2 p.m., Columbia College, 11600 Columbia College Drive, Sonora. Runaway Bunnies storytime, toddlers ages 2 to 3, 10:30 a.m., Tuolumne County Library, 480 Greenley Road, Sonora, 533-5507. Tuolumne Utilities District Board of Directors, 2 p.m., district office, 18885 Nugget Blvd., off Tuolumne Road. Tuolumne County Child Care Council, 3 to 5 p.m., Tuolumne County Superintendent Schoolâ€™s office, 175 S. Fairview Lane, Sonora, 533-0377. Friends of the Library Board of Directors, 3:30 p.m., Tuolumne County Library, 480 Greenley Road, Sonora, 533-5507. Columbia Area Advisory Council, 5:30 p.m., Eagle Cotage, Columbia State Historic Park. Columbia School District Board of Trustees, 6 p.m., school, 22540 Parrotts Ferry Road, Columbia, 532-0202. Sonora Cribbage Club, 6 p.m., Tuolumne County Senior Center, 540 Greenley Road, 533-3946. Summerville Elementary School Board of Trustees, 6 p.m., school, 18451 Carter St., Tuolumne, 928-4291. Curtis Creek School District Board of Trustees, 6:15 p.m., district office, 18755 Standard Road, Sonora, 533-1083. Mi-Wuk/Sugar Pine Fire Protection District Board of Directors, 7 p.m., fire station, 24247 Highway 108, Sugar Pine. Vietnam Veterans of America, Chapter No. 391, 7 p.m., Veterans Memorial Hall, 9 N. Washington St., Sonora, 532-2052. Tuolumne County Democratic Club, 7 p.m., Pine Tree Restaurant, 19601 Hess Ave., East Sonora, 536-0449. WEDNESDAY Grandparents raising grandchildren support group, 9:15 to 10:30 a.m., Delta Blood Bank, Sonora, 532-6272. ATCAA Food Bank distribution, 10 a.m. to 2 p.m., Columbia College, 11600 Columbia College Drive, Sonora. Senior Legal Advocacy, 10 a.m. to 4 p.m., 88 Bradford St., Sonora, 588-1597; 10 a.m. to 2 p.m., Tuolumne County Senior Center, 540 Greenley Road, Sonora. Mother Goose storytime, children to age 2, 10:30 a.m., Tuolumne County Library, 480 Greenley Road, Sonora, 533-5507. Cedar Ridge Volunteer Fire Department Auxiliary, 11:30 a.m., call for location, 586-7162. Child Abuse Prevention Coordinating Council, noon, Tuolumne County Superintendent of Schools Office, 175 S. Fairview Lane, Sonora, Room 217, 533-0377. Mi-Wuk/Sugar Pine Volunteer Fire Department Auxiliary, noon, fire station, 24247 Highway 108, Sugar Pine, 586-5256. Tuolumne County Transportation Council, 3 to 5 p.m., Board of Supervisors Chambers, fourth floor, 2 S. Green St., Sonora. Big Oak Flat/Groveland Unified School District Board of Trustees, 4:30 p.m., Tioga High School, Room. 4, 19304 Ferretti Road, Groveland. Jamestown School District Board of Trustees, 6 p.m., Jamestown School District office, 18299 Fifth Ave., Jamestown, 984-4058. Tuolumne Park and Recreation District Board of Directors, 6 p.m., district office, 18603 Pine St., Tuolumne. Town Hall Meeting, 6 p.m., Jamestown Community Hall, 18250 Main St., Jamestown. Summerville Union High School District Board of Trustees, 6:30 p.m., library, 17555 Tuolumne Road, Tuolumne, 928-3498. Town Hall Meeting, 6:30 p.m., Metropolitan 55 Main St., San Andreas. Jamestown Cemetery District Board, 7 p.m., Chicken Ranch Tribal Council Office, 16929 Chicken Ranch Road, Jamestown, 984-3699, 533-4747. Native Sons of the Golden West, Columbia Parlor No. 258, 7 p.m., NSGW hall, Main Street, Columbia, 588-8475. CALAVERAS COUNTY TODAY Calaveras County Board of Supervisors, 9 a.m., supervisors chambers, Government Center, 891 Mountain Ranch Road, San Andreas. Jenny Lind Fire Veterans Memorial District, 9 a.m., 189 Pine St., Valley Springs, 772-9650. Storytime for children, 10:30 a.m., Murphys Volunteer Library, 480 Park Lane, Murphys, 728-3036. Calaveras County Farm Bureau, 7 p.m., Grange Hall, 376 Russell Road, San Andreas, 772-3987. Calaveras Public Utility District, 7 p.m., 506 West St. Charles, San Andreas, 754-9442. WEDNESDAY Calaveras County Water District, 9 a.m., 423 E. St. Charles St., San Andreas, 754-3543. Friends of the Library, 10 a.m., Calaveras Central Library, 891 Mountain Ranch Road, San Andreas. Storytime, 11 a.m., Calaveras Central Library, 891 Mountain Ranch Road, San Andreas. Murphys Fire Protection District, 4 p.m., Station No. 1, 37 Jones St., Murphys, 728-3864. San Andreas Sanitary District, 5 p.m., 152 St. Charles St., San Andreas, 754-3281. Calaveras County Republican Party, 6 to 7 p.m., Fireside Room, Greenhorn Creek clubhouse, 711 McCauley Ranch Road, Angels Camp, 736-9522. Calaveras County Fair Board, 6:30 p.m., administrative building, Frogtown, Angels Camp, 736-2561. San Andreas Fire District, 7 p.m., 37 Church Hill Road, San Andreas, 754-4693.
